info.author: Alpeza
info.description:
# lorawandevgw (LoRaWAN XploreGateway Python API)

Esta libreria se emplea para desarrollar dispositivos virtuales LoRaWAN para el servidor [XploreGateway](xploregteway.md)

`lorawandevgw` implements the basic send/receive features of [LoRaWAN protocol v. 1.1.X](https://lora-alliance.org/sites/default/files/2018-04/lorawantm_specification_-v1.1.pdf)

For __mock__ LoRa WAN end Nodes.

## Install

```
pip install lorawandevgw
pip3 install lorawandevgw
```

## Get Start

The first step is download and install the LoRaWAN [XploreGateway](xploregteway.md). Next we can continue with the follow
_Python_ Script:

```python
from lorawandevgw import EndNode
import time
class MyExampleDevice(EndNode.EndNode):
    def __init__(self):
        super(MyExampleDevice, self).__init__(
        config=properties)
    # LoRa WAN downlink message handling
    def onRadioMessage(self,message):
        print(message)
    # Main Loop
    def loop(self):
        self.sendUnconfirmedMessage('{"hello":"world"}')
        time.sleep(5)
properties = {
    "devEUI":"0ADA123D04299F03",
    "appEUI":"70BCDF7ED0026123",
    "appKey":"ABCDEFGHI102930415F637989F3B7FFB",
    "devGateway":"localhost:1883"
}
devi = MyExampleDevice()
```

```
python3 MyExampleDevice.py
```

## Configuration

* `devEUI` : (mandatory)
* `appEUI` : (mandatory)
* `appKey` : (mandatory)
* `devGateway` : (mandatory)

## Functions and modules

* `self.sendUnconfirmedMessage(<message>)`: Sends _Unconfirmed Data Up_ message to LoRaWAN.

## Library Dependencies

## Features  v. 0.1.0

- OTAA Device Activation. (_Join Request_, _Join Accept_)
- Unconfirmed Data Up.
- Unconfirmed Data Down.


## Compile
```bash
project=$1
cd $project"/"$project
python3 setup.py bdist_wheel
python3 -m pip install "dist/"$project"-0.0.1-py3-none-any.whl" --upgrade
```
